> "Rebuilt our base!!! Improve our defences!!!!"said Hydras
> "The ark will be well guarded for a while... unless we find
> a way to came in that isnt ungarded... They came for her,
> but she is too worty..." he muttered from himself "Go to
> Perceptor, and ask her status"

Rodimus jumped as Hydras gave him the command to go to Perceptor, he
had not quite expected that but he nodded, "Of course." he said.
Transforming back into the vehicular mode, Rodimus quickly left the
room.

> and looking to the bots presents in the room "I'll need
> a new security chief, Perceptor will have too much work
> to do... but who?"

Cyclonus watched Hydras as he attempted to choose a new security
chief. He was still not sure of Hydras, a being who was the fusion of
the Galvatron he knew, but also of a Megatron that he did not.
Sometime he saw Galvatron in Hydras' attitude, but then sometimes
something else. He frowned, not sure if he were willing to do this,
yet for part of him it felt right.

"Yess" Skorponok said, cutting through Cyclonus' silence as he stepped
forward, "Perceptor will have much to do. I will keep your base
secure."

Scourge glanced at the massive Skorponok, not sure what to make of
him, although his first instinct was not to trust him.

"No." Cyclonus' said, finally speaking. "I will."

Skorponok glanced at Cyclonus frowning, anger stretching itself across
his face.

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclonus & Scourge/Rodimus/Skorponok)
